jd: From: Rahman, Webster Tech Solutions INC rahman@webstertechsolutions.com Reply to: rahman@webstertechsolutions.com Position: Angular Developer with .Net Location: Cary, North Carolina – (Day 1 onsite) Mandatory required skills: Angular Preferred/Desired skills: .Net Core, SQL Server Job Description:10+ years IT experience and 5+ solid knowledge of the Angular framework is essential for building robust applications.Strong knowledge in .Net Core and Microsoft technologyknowledge in building and reusing Angular components improves code quality and application performance.Strong Typescript, SQL and database experienceStrong knowledge in HTML, CSS for layout, styling, and other aspect of front end developmentStrong trouble-shooting and problem-solving skills; ability to independently track down answers and research data issues across multiple system touch pointGood written and spoken communications skills in English and thought-leadership skillsGood interpersonal skills are important for collaborating with other team members.
